title: Angry Men Take Over Bollywood Movies in 2025
summary: In 2025, Bollywood movies in India were mostly about angry and strong men. The year before, in 2024, many movies made by women got a lot of praise around the world. But in 2025, popular films like Dhurandhar, Chhaava, and War 2 focused on male heroes who were violent and powerful. These movies made a lot of money and people talked about them a lot. Only one movie in the top 10, called Lokah, had a woman as the main character. Experts say that movies have often centered on men for a long time, and it will take more years to see more stories about women. This shows how Bollywood changes from year to year.

background_read: Bollywood is a big movie industry in India that makes Hindi films. In 2024, many movies directed by women, like All We Imagine As Light and Girls Will Be Girls, got attention worldwide for telling good stories. But in 2025, most popular movies were about strong, angry men, such as Dhurandhar and War 2, which made more money. This shows how movie trends can change quickly. Experts explain that Bollywood has a long history of focusing on male heroes, and it might take time to have more movies about women.

WHAT: Angry men dominated Bollywood movies in 2025, while women-led stories were popular in 2024
WHERE: In India, especially in the Hindi film industry
WHY: To show how movie trends change and the need for more stories about women

perspectives.description: Mayank Shekhar says 2024 showed women filmmakers are leading global voices, not just trends.
